mapper.select: SELECT * FROM `doctor` where (`name` = ifnull(#{doctor.name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `name`) or isnull(`name`)) and (`phone` = ifnull(#{doctor.phone, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `phone`) or isnull(`phone`))
mapper.update: UPDATE `doctor` set `name`=#{doctorNew.name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `phone`=#{doctorNew.phone, jdbcType=VARCHAR} where (`name` = ifnull(#{doctorOld.name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `name`) or isnull(`name`)) and (`phone` = ifnull(#{doctorOld.phone, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `phone`) or isnull(`phone`))
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM `doctor` where (`name` = ifnull(#{doctor.name, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `name`) or isnull(`name`)) and (`phone` = ifnull(#{doctor.phone, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `phone`) or isnull(`phone`))
